title: UX Improvements v1.0
description: Visual hierarchy and information overload fixes. See prd-ux-improvements.md for details.

title: US-001: Default Sort by Health Score
description: Sort projects by health score ascending by default so problems appear first. Table view defaults to Health column sort (ascending). Cards view shows Failed/Warning before Success. Sort preference persists in localStorage. User can override with other columns. Update tests.
close_reason: Implemented default health sort (ascending) in TableView, updated tests

title: US-010: Environment Matrix â€” Version Drift Indicator
description: Show visual indicator when DEV version > PROD version. Arrow or row highlight for drift. Tooltip: 'DEV 2.14.6 is 3 versions ahead of PROD 1.10.8'. Summary count: '4 projects have unpromoted changes'. Tests verify drift detection.

title: US-002: Larger Health Score Badges
description: Make health badges more visually prominent. Increase from ~24px to ~40px diameter. Score number clearly visible. Color coding: green (80-100), yellow (50-79), red (0-49). Add subtle background fill. Badge clickable to open project details. Tests verify new dimensions.
close_reason: Increased health badge size from 28px to 40px, font from 11px to 16px. Badge already clickable with background colors. Added tests for dimensions.

title: US-003: Collapsible Pipeline Trends Section
description: Add expand/collapse toggle to Pipeline Trends section. Default: collapsed (showing 'Pipeline Trends â–¶'). Expanded shows 3 charts. State persists in localStorage. Smooth 200-300ms animation. Tests verify behavior.

title: US-004: Remove Empty Failures Accordion
description: Hide 'Failures (N)' accordion when count is 0. Remove contradictory 'No failures ğŸ‰' message. Summary section still shows 'FAILED: 0' count. Tests verify section hidden when failures=0.
close_reason: Verified Failures accordion conditionally renders. Created comprehensive tests to verify section hidden when failures=0, shows when >0. Summary stats still show 'Failed: 0' as expected. All 742 tests pass.

title: US-005: Compact Summary Bar
description: Reduce CI/CD Summary section height by ~40%. Consolidate stats into single row: TOTAL | SUCCESS | WARNING | FAILED | INACTIVE. Move Portfolio Health donut to right side (~80px). Remove redundant '12 PROJECTS' badge. Secondary stats below in smaller text. Tests verify layout.

title: US-006: Needs Attention Quick Filter
description: Add 'Needs Attention' filter button showing Failed + Warning combined. Button shows count: 'Needs Attention (11)'. Orange/red background to stand out. Filter state in URL query param. Tests verify filter logic and count.
close_reason: Added 'Needs Attention' quick filter showing Failed+Warning combined with count, orange/red gradient styling, URL query param support, and 9 comprehensive tests. All 751 tests pass.
